## Description {#details}

Serialize the remarks to LLVM bitstream.

This class provides ways to emit remarks in the LLVM bitstream format and its associated metadata.


<ul>
<li>The separate model: Separate meta: | Container info | String table | External file
Separate remarks: | Container info | <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/remarks/remark">Remark</a> version | Remark0 | Remark1 | Remark2 | ...</li>
<li>The standalone model: | Container info | String table | <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/remarks/remark">Remark</a> version | Remark0 | Remark1 | Remark2 | ...</li>
</ul>

Definition at line 51 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/bitstreamremarkserializer-h">BitstreamRemarkSerializer.h</a>.

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="StringRef BitstreamRemarkSerializerHelper::getBuffer ()">
Finalize the writing to a buffer.

The contents of the buffer remain valid for the lifetime of the object. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/any">Any</a> call to any other function in this class will invalidate the buffer.
